document.full_text: after expedia inc completes its announced plan to split into two public companies this year, the spun-off tripadvisor will likely find more favor on wall street than its former parent.
document.title: expedia shares gain on tripadvisor spin-off plan
lines_and_colors: after expedia inc completes its announced plan to split into two public companies this year, the spun-off tripadvisor will likely find more favor on wall street than its former parent.
